data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Sapporo pushes forward through Daiki Suga, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 1, Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 4, Sapporo needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kobe.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 11, Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Sapporo's Lucas Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kobe defender.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 13, Kobe to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kyogo Furuhashi for Kobe drives towards goal at Noevir Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sapporo push forward at Noevir Stadium and Yoshiaki Komai gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kobe defence.
In the minute 17, Takuro Kaneko (Sapporo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kobe.
Goal! Kyogo Furuhashi gives Kobe a 1-0 lead in Kobe.
In the minute 19, That's a fine assist from Gotoku Sakai.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kobe's half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 23, Sapporo's Takuro Kaneko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dyanfrez Douglas of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Noevir Stadium.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In the minute 38, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 42, Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
Hajime Matsuo signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Sapporo's area.
In Kobe Kobe attack through Takuya Yasui. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 43, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Kobe drives forward and Yuta Goke gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Hajime Matsuo blows to end the first-half.
It's now 2-0 in Kobe as Yuta Goke scores for Kobe.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Kobe.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Kobe throw-in in Sapporo's half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 49, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo advance rapidly upfield but Hajime Matsuo blows for offside.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Dyanfrez Douglas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kobe.
In the minute 58, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Kim Min-Tae (Sapporo) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 59, Hajime Matsuo awards Kobe a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 60, Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Sapporo's Takuro Kaneko is on target but unsuccessful.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 62, Goal! Kyogo Furuhashi extends Kobe's lead to 3-0.
Andres Iniesta with an assist there.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 67, Takuma Arano for Sapporo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Yutaro Oda is replacing Takuya Yasui for the home team.
In the minute 69, Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Kosuke Shirai is replacing Daiki Suga for Sapporo at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 69, Sapporo make their second substitution with Douglas replacing Ryosuke Shindo.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroki Miyazawa is on a sub for Lucas Fernandes for Sapporo.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 76, Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
The home team replace Kyogo Furuhashi with Keijiro Ogawa.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Kobe in the half of Sapporo.
Hiroki Miyazawa for Sapporo has been booked by Hajime Matsuo and receives a first yellow card.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Yoshiaki Komai with Riku Danzaki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
Sapporo's Douglas attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 83, Sapporo's Tsuyoshi Ogashiwa misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 85, Sapporo's Kosuke Shirai breaks free at Noevir Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kobe a goal kick.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
Hajime Matsuo awards the away team a throw-in.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 89, Thorsten Fink is making the team's third substitution at Noevir Stadium with Ryo Hatsuse replacing So Fujitani.
Thorsten Fink (Kobe) is making a fourth substitution, with Ryuho Kikuchi replacing Thomas Vermaelen.
Noriaki Fujimoto is on a sub for Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Kobe.
Free kick Sapporo.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo's Tsuyoshi Ogashiwa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hajime Matsuo awards Kobe a goal kick.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
Free kick Sapporo.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-0.
Kobe take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Yutaro Oda.
Kobe's Keijiro Ogawa has been booked in Kobe.
